page.title: 14SOCIAL CONCERNS,SALPERTON
page.content: There are several voluntarily-organised activities for the elderly.The Golden Link is a Senior Citizens' Club with members in several Cotswold villages,including Salperton and Hampen.The meetings are held monthly in village halls or private houses. There is a weekly Day centre at Brockhampton,and members of Shipton Oliffe Womens' Institute have installed a loop system in their village hall so that a Hard-of-Hearing Club can meet there .The Voluntary Help Service at Moreton organises private transport for these activities.The Cotswold District Council gives 7 in travel tokens to senior citizens.Most people use them for bus journeys.
